loans.use: to buy fertilizers and supplies to fertilize their corn crops.

loans.name: Lucia

texts.en:
Lucia is a 35-year-old single woman who works very hard to provide for her daily needs.

She has a food production/vending business in the Philippines and has requested a PHP 10,000 loan amount through NWTF to buy ingredients for her business. She has been in this business for 5 years. 

In the future, Lucia would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy ingredients for her food production business

loans.name: Vannak

texts.en:
Vannak, 27, is a married woman who lives in a small community of Kampong Cham Province, Cambodia. She has two children. 

Vannak is a garment factory worker and earns, on average, USD 5 a day. She has been in this job for two years. Her husband, Oun, 29, is a farmer who grows cassava to sell. He is able to make an income of USD 8 a day.

Vannak would like to apply for a Kiva loan to buy a plot of farmland to grow cassava. She hopes that this new farmland will become the main source of her family’s income and will help to remove poverty from their lives. 

She is thankful to all lenders for their financial support.

loans.use: to buy a plot of farmland for growing cassava

loans.name: Pheap

texts.en:
Pheap, 34, lives in a remote area of Kampong Cham Province, Cambodia. She has four children. 

To make a living, she works as a stone breaker and earns, on average, USD 5 a day. She has been in this career for fifteen years.

Pheap lives rather far from the water source so it is hard and time consuming for her to get water. For this reason, she is applying for a Kiva loan to dig a well for her household use. With the support of this loan, she hopes that she can get water to use more easily and faster than before. 

She is thankful to lenders for their financial support towards poor people.

loans.use: to dig a well

loans.name: Maria Julia

texts.es: Maria de 47 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposo, ella se dedica desde hace 20 años a la agricultura siembra maíz y frijol, su esposo le ayuda en las siembras, cuando su cosecha ya esta lista la almacena en los graneros que muestra la fotografía para luego comercializarla en los alrededores de la zona donde ella reside y con las ventas que realiza logra solventar algunos gastos de su hogar, ella está solicitando un crédito para la compra de semillas, fertilizantes, abonos, controles de plagas, pesticidas, etc. para tener un buen cultivo y asi tener mejores ingresos.
texts.en:
Maria is 47 years of age and lives in her own house with her husband.  She's been working in agriculture for 20 years, specifically planting corn and beans.  Her husband also helps with the planting and when the harvest is ready the product is stored in the barns and pictures are taken so she can sell it in the area close to where she lives.  With the sales she's able to cover some of the house expenses.
She's requesting a loan to buy seeds, fertilizers, and pesticides so she can have a good harvest and improve her income.

loans.use: to buy seeds, fertilizers, and pesticides.

loans.name: Santos Rafael

texts.es: Santos de 37 años de edad vive en casa propia con sus cinco hijos, el se dedica desde hace 26 años a la agricultura siembra maíz y frijol, y con las ventas que realiza logra solventar algunos gastos que se le presentan en su hogar, Santos quiere mejorar su casa terminando de construir el cuarto que muestra en la fotografía pero como no posee de suficiente capital para realizarlo, está solicitando a INTEGRAL un crédito para la compra de ladrillos, laminas, cemento, arena, puertas, balcones, polines y pago de mano de obra para que el y su familia puedan vivir más cómodos.
texts.en: 37 year-old Santos lives in his own house with his five children. He has been making a living for the last 26 years farming and growing corn and beans. He manages to cover some of the household expenses with the money from his sales. Santos wants to improve his house by finishing building the room which is shown in the photo; however, because he does not have enough money to do so, he is asking INTEGRAL for a loan to buy bricks, metal sheeting, cement, sand, doors, balconies, beams and to pay the labour costs, so that he and his family might live more comfortably.

loans.use: to buy bricks, metal sheeting, cement, sand, doors, balconies, beams and to pay the labour costs.

loans.name: Sok

texts.en:
Sok lives in Kampong Cham Province in Cambodia, and she has three children. 

To make a living and support her family, she manages and operates a farming business on a small piece of farmland, primarily growing rice and selling her agricultural products to local dealers and customers at the market. She has been in this type of business for thirty years. On average, she is able to earn USD 3 a day.

Now she would like to request a Kiva loan via HKL to buy a motorbike. This loan will allow her to have a personal vehicle so that she can travel more conveniently. 

She would like to thank all lenders for the financial support. She is awaiting your kindness.

loans.use: to buy a motorbike

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy construction materials like bricks, sand, and cement.

loans.name: Lorenzo Antonio

texts.es:
Lorenzo, de 28 años de edad, está acompañado y su pareja se encarga de los quehaceres del hogar, ellos tienen dos hijos y actualmente los dos estudian.

Lorenzo, se dedica a la agricultura, pero tambien sabe mucho acerca de la piscicultura, esto consiste en la crianza de peces en posas caseras, se ha dedicado ha ese negocio durante un buen tiempo, asegura que le da buenos ingresos, porque la venta de peces es buena.

Lorenzo, necesita el credito para invertir en su negocio de peces, para producir más y poder obtener mejores ingresos.

Lorenzo, desea arreglar su casa y sus condiciones de vida para él y su familia, tambien desea, darle una mejor educacion a sus hijos.
texts.en:
Lorenzo is 28 years old and has a partner who takes care of the house chores.  They have two children currently attending school.  Lorenzo works in agriculture but also knows a lot about aquaculture, growing fish in tanks at home.  He has worked in this business for some time and he's able to get good income because fish sales are good right now.  
Lorenzo needs the loan to invest in his fish selling business, to be able to produce more and have a better income.  Lorenzo wishes to fix his house and improve the living conditions for his family.  He also wishes to give his children a better education.

loans.use: to invest in his fish selling business.

loans.name: Noe

texts.es: Noe de 65 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposa, Noe se dedica desde hace 30 años al cultivo de maíz y frijol, y comercializa sus productos en los alrededores de la zona donde el reside, ya tiene muchos clientes por los buenos precio, con lo que obtiene de sus ventas es como ha podido salir adelante junto con su esposa, el esta solicitando un crédito para la compra de los insumos necesarios como: semilla, fertilizantes, abonos, controles de plagas y mejorar el terreno que muestra la fotografía para poder seguir con sus siembras y tener mejores ingresos.
texts.en:
Noe is 65 years old and owns a home with his wife. 

Noe has made a living for 30 years growing corn and beans, and he sells his products in the surroundings of the area where he lives. He now has many clients because of the good prices. The money he obtains from his sales is how he has been able to get by together with his wife. 

He is asking for a loan for the purchase of necessary supplies such as: seed, fertilizers, compost, pesticides and to improve the land which the photograph shows to be able to continue with his sowing and have higher income.

loans.use: to purchase necessary supplies such as: seed, fertilizers, compost, pesticides and to improve the land

loans.name: Josiane

texts.en:
Josiane is 24 years old. She is married. She is a farmer and she has been producing rice for five years. Also her husband is a farmer. With the loan from Kiva, she would like to buy more fertilizer. The profits from the business will be used to increase her savings.

The agriculture sector accounts for 37% of Rwanda's gross domestic product, generates 65% of Rwanda's export revenue, and employs approximately 90% of Rwandans (as of 2009). Despite the importance of agriculture to Rwandans and their economy, financial institutions view lending to fund agricultural activities as a high-risk proposition because the profitability of these activities is affected by weather, natural disasters, and price fluctuations. For this reason, farmers in Rwanda remain underserved by financial institutions. Urwego Opportunity Bank is expanding into this market and is happy to provide Kiva lenders with the opportunity to support Rwandan farmers.

loans.use: To buy more fertilizer

loans.name: Evelyn

texts.en:
Evelyn is a married woman with four children. She is a very hard-working entrepreneur. Evelyn is 36 years old and has two children who are in school.

Evelyn has a fishing business in the Philippines. She requested a PHP 9,000 loan amount through NWTF to buy fish nets and other materials needed for her business.

Evelyn has been in this business for four years. In the future, Evelyn would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy fish nets and other materials needed

loans.name: Jeannete

texts.en:
Jeannete is aged 45 years. She is married with three children aged between 2 and 9 years.  Three of them go to school. She is a farmer and she has been producing rice for 24 years, while her husband is also a farmer. With the loan from Kiva, she would like to buy more fertilizer. The profits from the business will be used to renovate her house.

The agriculture sector accounts for 37% of Rwanda's gross domestic product, generates 65% of Rwanda's export revenue, and employs approximately 90% of Rwandans (as of 2009). Despite the importance of agriculture to Rwandans and their economy, financial institutions view lending to fund agricultural activities as a high-risk proposition because the profitability of these activities is affected by weather, natural disasters, and price fluctuations. For this reason, farmers in Rwanda remain underserved by financial institutions. Urwego Opportunity Bank is expanding into this market and is happy to provide Kiva lenders with the opportunity to support Rwandan farmers.

loans.use: To buy more fertilizer

loans.name: Sadiatou

texts.fr: Agée de 36 ans, Sadiatou est une femme mariée et mère de trois enfants. Sadiatou habite à Sokpekopé et vend des champoings et des produits de beauté dans un atelier. Pour disposer du stock en permanence, Sadiatou s’approvisionne trois fois par mois au grand marché. Sadiatou souhaite répondre favorablement aux attentes de ses clients qui désirent ses produits. Sadiatou  demande ce crédit pour acheter des produits de beauté et disposer d’une rentabilité pour couvrir ses charges quotidiennes.
texts.en: 36 years old, Sadiatou is a married woman and the mother of three children. She lives in Sokpekopé and sells shampoo and other beauty products from a workshop. In order to maintain a permanent amount of supplies, Sadiatou stocks up three times a month at the big market. She would like to respond favorably to customer requests for specific products. Sadiatou is therefore asking for this loan in order to purchase more beauty products and ensure her business is profitable enough to cover her daily expenses.

loans.use: purchase 65 boxes of shampoo

loans.name: Ana Luz

texts.es: Ana de 34 años de edad se dedica desde muy joven a la agricultura su principal siembra es el maíz y frijol, sus productos son vendidos a los comerciantes de la zona donde ella reside, y con las ganancia que obtiene logra salir adelante, Ana vive en casa propia con sus dos hijos y su esposo, ella esta solicitando nuevamente un crédito para la compra mas de los insumos necesarios para la cosecha de este año y para la preparación del suelo que es donde desea empezar la cosecha para tener mejores ingresos y una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Ana, age 34, has worked in agriculture since she was very young.  Her main crops are corn and beans.  Her products are sold to merchants in the area where she lives.  She manages to get ahead with the earnings that she gets.  Ana lives in her own house with her two children and her husband.

She is once again requesting a loan to buy more of the supplies needed for this year’s crops.  She will also use the loan to prepare the soil where she wishes to start crops in order to have better income and a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy more of the supplies needed for this year's crops and to prepare the soil.

loans.name: Buenaventura

texts.es: Don Buenaventura, tiene 51 años de edad, vive en unión libre con su esposa, con quien tiene dos hijos. Reside en el municipio de Trujillo, Colon. Siempre se ha dedicado a la agricultura, cultiva maíz y frijoles, hace 4 años tiene una pulpería donde le ayuda su esposa. Actualmente esta solicitando un préstamo por 10,000 Lempiras para comprar mas productos nuevos para la venta como arroz, frijoles, verduras, azúcar, manteca, café, pan, lácteos, refrescos, churros, y productos de aseo.  Su plan es hacer crecer el negocio y brindar mejor vida a su familia.
texts.en:
Don Buenaventura is 51 years old and lives with his wife with whom he has 2 children.  He lives in the town of Trujillo, Colon.  He's always worked in agriculture planting corn and beans.  Four years ago he opened a convenience store where he helps his wife.  
He's requesting a loan for 10,000 Lempiras to buy more products for sale like rice, vegetables, beans, sugar, butter, coffee, bread, milk products, sodas, churros, and cleaning products.  His goal is to grow the business and improve the life of his family.

loans.use: to buy more products for sale like rice, vegetables, beans, sugar, butter, coffee, bread, milk products, sodas, churros, and cleaning products.

loans.name: Am

texts.en:
AM, 36, is a married woman who lives in a small community of Kampong Cham Province, Cambodia. She has five single children. To make a living and support her family, she manages and operates a farming business on a small farmland which is located near her house. On her farmland, she grows rice, and she sells her agricultural produce to the local dealers. On average, she can generate an earning of USD 4.00 per day.

The current farmland that she owns is small and it can provide little benefit to her. She wants to enlarge her farmland area but she cannot afford to. Therefore, she would like to get a Kiva loan to buy a plot of farmland for growing rice. She hopes this additional farmland will help to improve her living conditions. She is thankful to all lenders for their financial support.

loans.use: to buy a plot of farmland for growing rice

loans.name: Gloria

texts.es:
Gloria, no estudio, está casada y su pareja trabaja con ganado bovino, tiene dos hijos, que viven en casa y estan estudiando.

Gloria, trabaja con ganado bovino, lo ha hecho por más de seis años y decidio hacerlo para buscar un ingreso economico extra para la familia, antes solo se dedicaba a los oficios domesticos.

Gloria, necesita el crédito para comprar una yunta de bueyes, esto mejorara mucho sus ingresos, porque podra tener más ganado y mayores ganancias.

Sus sueños son poder trabajar lo mejor que se pueda, para darle un mejor futoro a sus hijos y la oportunidad que estudien.
texts.en:
Gloria did not go school. She is married and her husband works with cattle. She has two children who live at home and are in school.

Gloria works with cattle, which she has done for more than six years. She decided to do this for an extra economic income for her family. Previously she made a living in domestic trades.

Gloria needs this loan to buy a pair of oxen. This will greatly improve her income, because she will have more livestock and higher profits.

Her dream is to work the best that she can and give a better future and the opportunity to study to her children.

loans.use: to buy a pair of oxen.

loans.name: Pha

texts.en:
Pha, 35, lives in a community in Kampong Cham Province, Cambodia. She has three children. To make a living and support the family, she manages and operates a farming business, primarily growing rice and selling her agricultural product to the local dealers and customers in the market. So far, she has been in this business for fifteen years. On average, she is able to make an earning of 5 USD a day.

In this farming season, she is lacking money to buy some farm supplies for her mango plantation. To continue her farming, she is borrowing some money from Kiva now to buy farm supplies like fertilizer, seeds and insecticides. She is thankful to lenders for the financial support. She is awaiting your kindness.

loans.use: to buy farm supplies like fertilizer, seeds and insecticides

loans.name: Zulaykho

texts.en:
Zulaykho, 38 years old, is a housewife and the mother of 2 children. Because of poor living conditions in their family, Zulaykho`s husband departed to the Russian Federation and is a migrant worker in Russia. 

Zulaykho tries to provide for her children. She is a very good seamstress and has been sewing women's dresses for 6 years. To improve her sewing activities, she wants to buy a computerized sewing machine. Unfortunately, she does not have enough money. Zulaykho needs Kiva lenders' help.

loans.use: to buy a computerized sewing machine.

loans.name: Oscar Armando

texts.es: Oscar de 52 años de edad es un hombre muy trabajador quien se dedica a la agricultura prácticamente toda su vida productiva, y gracias a esa experiencia es como ha logrado obtener buenos cultivos, el cultiva maíz y maicillo y los vende en los pueblos aledaños, con lo que obtiene de su ventas ha logrado salir adelante con su familia, Oscar vive en casa propia con su esposa y su hijo, el esta solicitando nuevamente un crédito para la compra de mas semillas, fertilizantes, abonos, controles de plagas, etc. y mejorar el terreno que muestra en la fotografía para poder continuar con su trabajo y tener mejores ingresos y seguir le dando a su familia lo que necesita sin limitación alguna.
texts.en:
Oscar is a hard working 52 year old man who's been working on agriculture his whole productive life and because of that he has been able to obtain good harvests.  He plants corn and sorghum and sells them in the nearby towns.  With what he earns he's been able to maintain his family.  Oscar lives in his own house with his wife and son.  
He's requesting another loan to buy seeds, fertilizers and herbicides to improve the plot of land shown in the picture so he can continue with his work, have better income, and give his family whatever they need without limitations.

loans.use: to buy seeds, fertilizers and herbicides to improve his land.

loans.name: Jose Antonio

texts.es: Jose de 57 años de edad vive en casa propia con sus tres hijos, el se dedica a la actividad agropecuaria, cultiva maíz y frijol, adicional también trabaja como jornalero, Jose tiene 30 años de experiencia en la agricultura inicio su actividad con capital propio, los producto son comercializados en los diferentes mercados que están cerca de su casa, el está solicitando un crédito para la compra de los insumos necesarios para la cosecha de este año y también mejorar el terreno que muestra en la fotografía y asi poder tener mejores ingresos para una mejor estabilidad económica.
texts.en:
Jose, age 57, lives in his own house with his three children.  His business activity is farming.  He grows corn and beans.  He also works as a day laborer.  Jose has 30 years of experience in agriculture.  He started his business activity with his own money.  The products are sold at the different markets that are close to his house.

He is requesting a loan to buy the supplies needed for this year’s crop and to improve the land shown in the photograph.  This way he will have improved earnings in order to have better financial stability.

loans.use: to buy the supplies needed for this year’s crop and to improve the land.

loans.name: Teresita

texts.en:
Teresita is a married woman with nine children. She is a very hard-working entrepreneur. Teresita is 62 years old now.

Teresita has a fishing business in the Philippines. She requested a PHP 10,000 loan amount through NWTF to buy fish nets and other materials needed for her business.

Teresita has been in this business for 10 years. In the future, Teresita would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy fish nets and other materials needed for her business
